scripts.rs-db-seed: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210716125238-users.js && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210716225046-ride-status.js && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210718204543-booking-status.js
scripts.rs-db-seed-rides: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210716125238-users.js && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210716225046-ride-status.js && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210717012650-rides.js && sequelize db:seed --seed 20210718204543-booking-status.js
scripts.rs-db-seed-all: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
